name: The Siege of Yggdrasil
description:
The siege of Yggdrasil

Hel, the goddes of the underworld is attacking Yggdrasil, the tree in the center of the world. All trees in its valley, except a few far away stone pines, were already destroyed by Hels crawlers. She sent her wolfs to guard these insects and to destroy the world. You have to defend Yggdrasil. Gather wood and build a wall around it. Fight her wolfes and slay her crawlers. After this you can try to stop Hel by destroying her crimson crystal.

UE4 marketplace:
Player Build System, Viking Ulf, Photo-scanned Realistic Tree, Environment Set,  Necro's Utility Material Pack, Quadruped Fantasy Creatures, Omol Droid-Predator and V3: Clean me up, Scotty. 

Using some sound effects from freesound.org:
85849__mwlandi__meat-slap-5
398405__caitlin-100__scrape
337101__ivolipa__group-of-dogs-barking
372198__original-sound__error-bleep-3
254347__cmorris035__autoharp-chord-sweep-all-01
483606__raclure__strong-blow
And a sound of a breaking stone where I lost the source
